Title: Sleepless
Plot: Mulder reluctantly accepts a new partner, Agent Alex Krycek, and they investigate the deaths of several Green Beret soldiers who participated in a sleep deprivation experiment during the Vietnam war.
GuestStars: Mitchell Kosterman, Don Thompson, David Adams, Michael Puttonen, Anna Hagan, Paul Bittante, Claude de Martino, Nicholas Lea, Jon Gries, Tony Todd
